TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegisterAssembly extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink
Public Class RegisterAssembly Inherits AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension Implements ITypeLibExporterNotifySink

span.span: Implements the RegisterAssembly task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 RegisterAssembly 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [RegisterAssembly 工作](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64 /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 無法解析註冊為 32 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫。Framework64/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 無法解析註冊為 64 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫。Framework/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. 例如，如果您註冊 ClassLibrary1 稱為 64 位元電腦上的 32 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫，執行 Visual Studio 中，並將目標變更為 x64，建置會失敗，發生下列錯誤：For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`

summary.span: 取得或設定 RegisterAssembly 工作與 [UnregisterAssembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3) 工作之間狀態的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the state between the RegisterAssembly task and the [UnregisterAssembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3) task.

summary.span: 如此可防止 UnregisterAssembly 工作嘗試取消註冊無法在 RegisterAssembly 工作中註冊的組件。

span.span: This prevents the UnregisterAssembly task from attempting to unregister an assembly that failed to register in the RegisterAssembly task.

value.span: 所需的狀態資訊UnregisterAssembly執行適當的清理工作。

span.span: The state information necessary for the UnregisterAssembly task to do proper clean-up.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CreateCodeBase { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定此工作是否會在登錄中建立程式碼基底項目，其指定未安裝於全域組件快取中之組件的檔案路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task creates a codebase entry in the registry, which specifies the file path for an assembly that is not installed in the global assembly cache.

value.span: 如果工作會在登錄中建立程式碼基底項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the task creates a codebase entry in the registry; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將接著安裝要在全域組件快取中註冊的組件，則不應該指定這個選項。You should not specify this option if you will subsequently install the assembly that you are registering into the global assembly cache.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記錄錯誤，指出指定的組件不會註冊為 COM interop，在所有情況下。Logs an error indicating that the specified assembly is not registered for COM interop in all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ TypeLibFiles { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要從指定組件產生的類型程式庫。

span.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

value.span: 要從指定組件產生的類型程式庫。

span.span: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的類型程式庫包含組件內所定義的可存取類型定義。The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly. 只有在下列其中一項條件成立時，才會產生類型程式庫︰The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - 該名稱的類型程式庫不存在於該位置。A type library of that name does not exist at that location. - 已有類型程式庫，但超過傳入中的組件。A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in. 如果類型程式庫比傳入的組件還新時，不會建立新的程式庫，但仍會註冊該組件。If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered. 如果指定這個屬性，它必須有相同數目的項目，例如屬性或工作將會失敗。If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the property or the task will fail. 如果沒有指定輸入，該工作將預設為該組件的名稱，並將項目的副檔名變更為 .tlb。If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
